rows.label: tlk41700121_04_msg0001
rows.name:
As for Iraada Village, which
was occupied by bandits...
rebuilding it seems hopeless.

rows.label: tlk41700121_04_msg0002
rows.name:
All the villagers were wiped out,
and every building was destroyed.
There's nothing to do but give up.

rows.label: tlk41700121_04_msg0003
rows.name:
That village was always small, and never
had a military garrison stationed there,
but for them to do something so terrible...

rows.label: tlk41700121_04_msg0004
rows.name:
To the people of Iraada Village...
may you rest in peace...
